alert.note: Alert for Atchison (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 29 at 7:44PM CDT until March 29 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Atchison County in northeastern Kansas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 743 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Muscotah, or 9 miles south of Horton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Atchison, Effingham, Lancaster, Muscotah, Farmington, Huron, Cummings and Arrington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
